General.Name: Shenzhen Mason Technologies Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Mason Technologies Co.,Ltd researches, develops, designs, produces, and sells medium and high-end LED light source device packaging and LED application lighting products in China and internationally. The company offers street, tunnel, high bay, flood, and three-proof lights; and plug-in and patches. It also provides professional services for real estate properties; and internet marketing services for home furnishing, as well as professional communication services. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
